```{r}
restEmo=read.csv('/cbica/projects/pinesParcels/results/aggregated_data/BwSubj_restEmoARI.csv')
# convert to matrix
restEmoMat=data.matrix(restEmo)
# extract same-subject values
wInsubj=diag(restEmoMat)
# get index of upper triangle
UTI=upper.tri(restEmoMat)
UT=restEmoMat[UTI]
# index of lower
LTI=lower.tri(restEmoMat)
LT=restEmoMat[LTI]
# both together makes b/w subj. comaprisons here
BwSubj=c(UT,LT)

hist(wInsubj)
hist(BwSubj)
```
